topic.title: Cancer Progression Agreed Date (Primary Cancer Pathway)
topic.shortdesc: A Cancer Progression Agreed Date (Primary Cancer Pathway) is the date that the Cancer Progression was agreed by the CARE PROFESSIONAL TEAM during a Primary Cancer Pathway.
